channel.title: Help - Adding Models & Attacking Emotes
channel.description:
I need help adding a few NPC models & attacking emotes. I would like the 508 models and attacking styles if thats possible? Thanks.
Now - Green Dragon:
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/4gn1ih.jpg[/img]
Now - General Graardor:
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/35m1p8j.jpg[/img]
Thanks, Ben
